error.message: Class Drupal\youtube\Tests\YouTubeTest extends deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.

Call to method setUp() of deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, use \Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3030340. Replacement available from drupal:8.6.0.
Call to deprecated function file_scan_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::scanDirectory() instead.
